subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: A superb putter, Casper also claimed a Masters title and finished with 51 PGA Tour victories, but he was overshadowed in his prime by other stars.
snippet: A superb putter, Casper also claimed a Masters title and finished with 51 PGA Tour victories, but he was overshadowed in his prime by other stars.
